problem.markdown:
1. At resonance, amplification factor depends only on?
() frequency ratio (x) damping ratio () deflection due to static force () none of these
2. A system with 20kg mass 20N/m stiffness and 10Ns/m damping is being operated at 1rad/s if Xst=2cm what is the value of X0 ?
() 2cm () 1cm (x) 4cm () none of these
3. Phase difference between input and response at resonance is 90o
() false (x) true
4. Phase difference between input and response of a system was found to be π/4. With mass of system 20kg and stiffness 2N/mm if operating frequency was 5rad/s what was the damping in the system (in Ns/m)
() 400 () 200 (x) 300 () 100
5. Amplification factor of a system was found to be 1 at resonance. What would be its damping ratio?
() 0.25 () 0.125 (x) 0.5 () 1
